name: Zombie Rush (Waddle Games)
description:
Zombie Rush is an active shooter game where you try to survive as long as you can through levels - but watch out, the Zombies get FASTER and HARDER every level!

Controls:

Use A and D keys to move left and right.

Mouse Click to shoot.

S to open shop.

M to close shop.

W to switch through weapons.

Also, press P to pause and Q to unpause.

R to reload!

Press X to equip shield if you have $150.

Press H to use healing potion if you have one.

Click SPACE to show high scores and Up Arrow to hide them again.

Press and Hold Down Arrow to activate laser scope.

Also playable at: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/679372337/
